items.sentence: Tom is better at speaking French than Mary is.
Tom is downstairs right now talking with Mary.
Tom is far better today than he was yesterday.
What makes you think that I don\'t want to go?
We watched the baseball game on TV last night.
We were having a good time until Tom got here.
We were having a lot of fun until Tom arrived.
What color are you going to paint the ceiling?
Tom may borrow my car any afternoon next week.
Tom might be able to help you, but I doubt it.
